sentences.en: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
Is it worthwhile getting angry over such a trifling matter?
sentences.cn: 为这点小事犯得着生气 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is perhaps worthwhile to use a simplistic model.
sentences.cn: 用最简单的模式也许是值得的.

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to consider this point more closely.
sentences.cn: 更严密地考虑这一点是值得的.

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to include really high-quality illustrations.
sentences.cn: 把真正高质量的插图包括进去是值得的。

sentences.en: It might be worthwhile to consider your attitude to an insurance policy.
sentences.cn: 考虑一下你对投保的看法也许有所助益。

sentences.en: It was worthwhile to be a pirate, after all.
sentences.cn: 归根到底,当个海盗还是值得的.

sentences.en: It would not prove worthwhile to instigate a nuclear attack.
sentences.cn: 挑起核攻击最终是不值得的.

sentences.en: Spending one dollar to retrieve thirty was absolutely worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 破费一块来钱而能要回那一笔款,是上算的事.
教书是一种有价值的职业.

sentences.en: The President's trip to Washington this week seems to have been worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 总统本周的华盛顿之行看来是有价值的。

sentences.en: The teacher recommended some really worthwhile novels to his students.
sentences.cn: 老师推荐给学生一些真正有价值的小说.

sentences.en: Their sobering conversation brought home to everyone present the serious and worthwhile work the Red Cross does.
sentences.cn: 他们发人深省的对话使在座的每个人都清楚地认识到红十字会所从事的严肃而有价值的工作。

sentences.en: This approach has made many worthwhile contributions to management.
sentences.cn: 这个学派对于管理作出了许多有价值的贡献.

sentences.en: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.cn: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

sentences.en: We need to get rid of the idea that we must be liked all the time in order to be worthwhile.
sentences.cn: 我们必须抛弃那种认为要想活得有价值就得始终取悦他人的想法。

words.tran_cn: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的

trans.tran_cn: 有价值的，令人愉快的，值得花费时间/金钱/精力的
trans.tran_en: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it
